title: Deluxe Script
tags: script cool stylish hand drawn hipster classy elegant retro
content:
Hey!

I was wondering if anyone could suggest any fonts like this one (I'm assuming this was hand drawn). I need a classy script font for a client's Deluxe Kombi Van Service but I don't want to pour in hours drawing it myself by hand.

He does a lot of events like weddings so I'm looking for something that looks quality, elegant, a little bit retro and a little bit  
'hipster'.

Appreciate any help, cheers!

Billy.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [deathofcool-script.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019145911/http:/typophile.com/files/deathofcool-script.jpg) | 63.84 KB |
author: Billy Lyons Designs

comments.content:
Two very different styles - but see what you think:  
 [Mousse Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019145911/http:/old.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/mousse-script/) and [Silk Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019145911/http:/old.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/silk-script/). Both offer the versatility of lots of alternates.
